data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dung, Le Doan, Tsukagoshi, Akira (2018): Three new species of the genera Loxoconcha and Xestoleberis (Crustacea, Ostracoda, Podocopida) from central and southern Vietnam. Zootaxa 4472 (1): 111-126, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4472.1.5|3 occurrences
